Command Line Tools¶

ms_deisotope includes several command line tools.

Tools

  • ms-index
    • Data Conversion
      • mzML Conversion
      • MGF Conversion
      • mzMLb Conversion
    • Indexing
      • ms-index byte-index
      • ms-index metadata-index
      • ms-index msms-intervals
    • Analytical Utilities
      • ms-index describe
      • ms-index charge-states
      • ms-index precursor-clustering
      • ms-index spectrum-clustering
  • ms-deisotope
    • ms-deisotope
